lf8_conflict_resolution.primary_vs_secondary: When pain relief conflicts with comfort or status, pain relief wins.
lf8_conflict_resolution.biological_override_rule: Lower-rank LF8 drivers override higher ones when safety or pain is at stake.
example_conflicts: Premium aesthetics vs clear relief messaging
Fast checkout vs a necessary sizing step
Soft cushioning appeal vs structural support

ranked_principles.unlosable_frame: Relief is the brand, not the aesthetic.

collision_log.name: Quiz vs fast purchase
collision_log.conflict: Quick checkout reduces steps, quiz increases steps.
collision_log.resolution: Keep a short diagnostic quiz but allow skip after explaining value.
collision_log.cost_accepted: Slightly higher friction for better fit and lower returns.
collision_log.unlosable_frame: Fit accuracy is part of the promise.
collision_log.precedent_established: Diagnostic step remains unless LTV dips below target.

collision_log.name: Minimal design vs proof density
collision_log.conflict: More proof adds clutter; restraint reduces evidence.
collision_log.resolution: Use fewer proof elements but make each one stronger and clearer.
collision_log.cost_accepted: Lower total proof count for higher clarity.
collision_log.precedent_established: Proof appears in fewer, higher-impact modules.

collision_log.name: Soft comfort language vs structural support truth
collision_log.conflict: Comfort language sells; structural truth is less emotional.
collision_log.resolution: Lead with relief promise and explain structure as the reason.

override_clause.condition: If user safety or clinical accuracy is at risk.
override_clause.return_criteria: Resume normal hierarchy once safety and accuracy are restored.

unlosable_frames.sacrifice: Lower conversion from added fit step

derivation_log.axiom: Attention is sacred. Every demand on consciousness must be earned.

chain.decision: Rank pain relief above aesthetic restraint.
chain.rationale: LF8 hierarchy requires relief to override secondary drivers.

chain.decision: Codify collisions for fit friction and proof density.
